Class TextBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.fx.controls.abstract_builders.NodeBuilder<javafx.scene.text.Text, TextBuilder>
com.dua3.utility.fx.controls.abstract_builders.ShapeBuilder<javafx.scene.text.Text, TextBuilder>
com.dua3.utility.fx.controls.TextBuilder
public class TextBuilder extends ShapeBuilder<javafx.scene.text.Text, TextBuilder>
An abstract base class for building nodes, providing a fluent API for configuring and creating instances of the node type specified by the generic parameter N.

    • bindFillFx

      @Deprecated(since="20.0.4", forRemoval=true) public TextBuilder bindFillFx(javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<javafx.scene.paint.Paint> fill)
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      use fillFx(ObservableValue) instead
      Binds the given ObservableValue to the fill property of the node being built. This allows the fill property of the node to dynamically reflect the value of the provided observable.
      Overrides:
      bindFillFx in class ShapeBuilder<javafx.scene.text.Text, TextBuilder>
      Parameters:
      fill - the ObservableValue representing the fill value to be bound
      Returns:
      this instance of the builder

    • font

    • bindFontFx

      @Deprecated(since="20.0.4", forRemoval=true) public TextBuilder bindFontFx(javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<javafx.scene.text.Font> font)
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      use fontFx(ObservableValue) instead
      Binds the Font property of the Text node to the specified ObservableValue.

      This allows the font property of the node to dynamically update whenever the value in the provided observable changes.

      Parameters:
      font - the ObservableValue providing the font to bind to the node's font property
      Returns:
      this TextBuilder instance for method chaining

    • fontFx

      public TextBuilder fontFx(javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<javafx.scene.text.Font> font)
      Binds the Font property of the Text node to the specified ObservableValue.

      This allows the font property of the node to dynamically update whenever the value in the provided observable changes.

      Parameters:
      font - the ObservableValue providing the font to bind to the node's font property
      Returns:
      this TextBuilder instance for method chaining
